mapper.select: select a.*, b.replyphoto_oriname, b.replyphoto_newname from cafereply a left outer join replyphoto b on a.cafereply_idx = b.cafereply_idx where a.cafereply_stat = 1 order by a.cafereply_likecnt desc limit 2

select a.*, b.replyphoto_oriname, b.replyphoto_newname from cafereply a left outer join replyphoto b on a.cafereply_idx = b.cafereply_idx where a.cafereply_stat = 1 and cafereply_ratestar >= 4.0 order by a.cafereply_ratestar desc;

select a.*, b.bmem_area_name, b.bmem_image1, c.diet_date, c.diet_code, c.diet_date_name from cafe a left outer join bmember b on a.mem_id = b.mem_id left outer join diet c on a.cafe_idx = c.cafe_idx and c.diet_menu like CONCAT('%',#{param1},'%') where a.mem_id in (select mem_id from bmember b where bmem_area_name like CONCAT('%',#{param1},'%')) or a.cafe_title like CONCAT('%',#{param1},'%') or a.cafe_idx in (select c.cafe_idx from diet c where c.diet_menu like CONCAT('%',#{param1},'%') and c.diet_date between #{param2} and #{param3} ) order by REPLACE(${param4},'"','') desc
select *, max(cafereply_likecnt) as maxcnt from cafereply where cafereply_stat = 1 group by mem_id
